alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 4:43AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Morgan, southwestern Putnam, northeastern Monroe, Butts, northwestern Jones, Jasper and south central Newton Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 442 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Indian Springs State Park, or over Jackson, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and enhanced risk for downed trees. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects is expected. Trees can also down more easily with already wet soil from previous rainfall. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Jackson, Monticello, Flovilla, Jenkinsburg, Shady Dale, Turtle Cove, Worthville, Resseaus Crossroads, Round Oak, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Blount, Eudora, North Alcovy, McElheneys Crossroads, Berner, Godfrey, Willard, High Falls State Park and Calvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
